        <p>Want to help create the healthiest nation in one generation?</p>
<p><br />
</p>

<p><br />
</p>
<p>Find out <a href="/policies-and-advocacy/advocacy-for-public-health/members-speak-out">how APHA members are speaking out</a> for key issues.</p>

<div class="apha-feature">
    <h2 id="pagelayout_0_tertiarycontent_0_txtHeader" style="color:#00568A;">About APHA</h2>
    <div class="managed-content">        
        <p>APHA champions the health
of all people and all communities.
We are the only organization that
influences federal policy, has a nearly 150-year perspective and
brings together members from all
fields of public health.</p>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="promo-block-one">
    <h2 id="pagelayout_0_tertiarycontent_4_PromoHeader" class="title text-promo" style="color:#333333;">
        New at APHA
    </h2>
    <div class="managed-content">
        <p><strong><a href="/publications-and-periodicals/the-nations-health/public-health-qa">Q &amp; As with U.S. Surgeon General Jerome Adams and Acting CDC Director Anne Schuchat</a></strong></p>
<hr color="black" />
    </div>
</div>


<div class="promo-block-one">
    <h2 id="pagelayout_0_tertiarycontent_5_PromoHeader" class="title text-promo" style="color:#333333;">
        AJPH - Current Issue
    </h2>
    <div class="managed-content">
        <p><a href="http://ajph.aphapublications.org/toc/ajph/108/4" target="_blank">April 2018</a><br />
<strong>The&nbsp;Public Health Dialogue #NPHW</strong></p>
<p><a href="http://ajph.aphapublications.org/toc/ajph/108/4" target="_blank"><img height="110" alt="AJPH The Public Health Dialogue" width="220" src="/-/media/images/pubs/ajph/ajph_april2018.ashx?la=en&amp;hash=96CA35F2962E6C13F13D0600FF1E5676004EF29D" /></a></p>
<p>This issue showcases articles on public health advocacy, quantifying opioid overdose deaths and the storage practices of U.S. gun owners.</p>
<a target="_blank" href="http://ajph.aphapublications.org/page/subscriptions.html">Subscribe to <em>AJPH</em></a><em></em>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr color="black" />
    </div>
</div>

	<div id="donateDropFC7C1C611A3748AFAC218B04A9F72AA6" data-dropdown-content="" class="f-dropdown content social-feed" style="position: absolute; top: 65px; left: -99999px;">
        <div class="managed-content">
			<p>Public health improves quality of life, extends life expectancy, reduces human suffering and saves resources over the long term.</p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.apha.org/donate">Donate today</a> and help APHA promote and protect the health of all people by creating the healthiest nation in one generation.</p>
<p>APHA is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization.</p>
